verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> for I have hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> that I may perform <S%H7896><s%> these <S%H428><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> of Mine among <S%H7130><s%> them,

and that you may tell <S%H5608><s%> in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of your son, <S%H1121><s%> and of your grandson, <S%H1121><s%> how <S%H854><s%> <S%H834><s%> I made <S%H9412><s%> a mockery <S%H9412><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and how <S%H834><s%> I performed <S%H7760><s%> My signs <S%H226><s%> among them; that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> "

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> 'How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> will you refuse <S%H3985><s%> to humble <S%H6031><s%> yourself before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Me? Let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Me.

'For if <S%H518><s%> you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> locusts <S%H697><s%> into your territory. <S%H1366><s%>

'And they shall cover <S%H3680><s%> the surface <S%H5869><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> so that no <S%H3808><s%> one shall be able <S%H3201><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%> They shall also eat <S%H398><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of what <S%H6413><s%> has escaped <S%H6413><s%> – what is left <S%H7604><s%> to you from the hail <S%H1259><s%> – and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> which sprouts <S%H6779><s%> for you out of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

'Then your houses <S%H1004><s%> shall be filled, <S%H4390><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> [something] which <S%H834><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> your fathers nor <S%H1><s%> your grandfathers have seen, <S%H3808><s%> from the day <S%H1><s%> that they came <S%H7200><s%> upon the earth <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H1961><s%> this <S%H127><s%> day. <S%H5704><s%>' "And he turned <S%H2088><s%> and went <S%H3117><s%> out from Pharaoh. <S%H6437><s%>

And Pharaoh's servants <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> will this <S%H2088><s%> man be a snare <S%H4170><s%> to us? Let <S%H7971><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%> Do you not realize <S%H3045><s%> that Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is destroyed?"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> were brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Go, <S%H1980><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God! <S%H430><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> are the ones that are going <S%H1980><s%>?"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "We shall go <S%H1980><s%> with our young <S%H5288><s%> and our old; <S%H2205><s%> with our sons <S%H1121><s%> and our daughters, <S%H1323><s%> with our flocks <S%H6629><s%> and our herds <S%H1241><s%> we will go, <S%H1980><s%> for we must hold a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Thus <S%H3651><s%> may the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be with you, if <S%H834><s%> ever <S%H9201><s%> I let <S%H7971><s%> you and your little <S%H2945><s%> ones <S%H2945><s%> go! <S%H7971><s%> Take <S%H7200><s%> heed, <S%H7200><s%> for evil <S%H9567><s%> is in your mind. <S%H6440><s%>

"Not so! <S%H3651><s%> Go <S%H1980><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> the men <S%H1397><s%> [among you,] and serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for that is what you desire. <S%H1245><s%>" So they were driven <S%H1644><s%> out from Pharaoh's presence. <S%H6440><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for the locusts, <S%H697><s%> that they may come <S%H5927><s%> up on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> plant <S%H6212><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> [even] all <S%H3605><s%> that the hail <S%H1259><s%> has left. <S%H7604><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his staff <S%H4294><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> directed <S%H5090><s%> an east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that night; <S%H3915><s%> and when it was morning, <S%H1242><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> brought <S%H5375><s%> the locusts. <S%H697><s%>

And the locusts <S%H697><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and settled <S%H5117><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the territory <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> [they were] very <S%H3966><s%> numerous. <S%H3515><s%> There had never <S%H3808><s%> been <S%H1961><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> [many] locusts, <S%H697><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> would there be so <S%H3651><s%> [many] again. <S%H310><s%>

For they covered <S%H3680><s%> the surface <S%H5869><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> so that the land <S%H776><s%> was darkened; <S%H2821><s%> and they ate <S%H398><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> plant <S%H6212><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the trees <S%H6086><s%> that the hail <S%H1259><s%> had left. <S%H3498><s%> Thus nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> green <S%H3418><s%> was left <S%H3498><s%> on tree <S%H6086><s%> or plant <S%H6212><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hurriedly <S%H4116><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> and against you.

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, please <S%H4994><s%> forgive <S%H5375><s%> my sin <S%H9128><s%> only <S%H389><s%> this <S%H6471><s%> once, <S%H6471><s%> and make <S%H6279><s%> supplication <S%H6279><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> that He would only <S%H7534><s%> remove <S%H5493><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> death <S%H4194><s%> from me."
And he went <S%H3318><s%> out from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and made <S%H6279><s%> supplication <S%H6279><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shifted <S%H2015><s%> [the wind <S%H7307><s%>] to a very <S%H3966><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> west <S%H3220><s%> wind which took <S%H5375><s%> up the locusts <S%H697><s%> and drove <S%H8628><s%> them into the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea; <S%H3220><s%> not one <S%H259><s%> locust <S%H697><s%> was left <S%H7604><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the territory <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh's heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he did not let <S%H7971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the sky, <S%H8064><s%> that there may be darkness <S%H2822><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> even a darkness <S%H2822><s%> which may be felt. <S%H4959><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and there was thick <S%H653><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for three <S%H7969><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

They did not see <S%H7200><s%> one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> did anyone <S%H376><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> from his place <S%H8478><s%> for three <S%H7969><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> but all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> light <S%H216><s%> in their dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H1980><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> let your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds <S%H1241><s%> be detained. <S%H3322><s%> Even <S%H1571><s%> your little <S%H2945><s%> ones <S%H2945><s%> may go <S%H1980><s%> with you."

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "You must also <S%H1571><s%> let <S%H5414><s%> us have <S%H5414><s%> <S%H3027><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> and burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, <S%H5930><s%> that we may sacrifice <S%H6213><s%> [them] to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

"Therefore, our livestock, <S%H4735><s%> too, <S%H1571><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> with us; not a hoof <S%H6541><s%> will be left <S%H7604><s%> behind, <S%H7604><s%> for we shall take <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of them to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%> And until <S%H5704><s%> we arrive <S%H935><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> we ourselves <S%H587><s%> do not know <S%H3045><s%> with what <S%H4100><s%> we shall serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"
But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh's heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he was not willing <S%H14><s%> to let <S%H7971><s%> them go. <S%H7971><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Get <S%H1980><s%> away <S%H1980><s%> from me! Beware, <S%H8104><s%> do not see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> again, <S%H3254><s%> for in the day <S%H3117><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> you shall die! <S%H4191><s%>"
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "You are right; <S%H9210><s%> I shall never <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> again! <S%H3254><s%>"
